---

Vector Creation
```{r}
a=c(1:20)
a
```
Vector Operation
```{r}
a+3
a-2
a^2
b=c(-4:1)
a+b
d=c(-4:9)
a
d
any(a<d)
all(a<d)
a[4]
f=c("january","february","march","april","may","june")
nchar(f)
```
Naming Vectors
```{r}
c(one="a",two="b",three="c")
w=1:3
names(w)=c("a","b","c")
w
```
